mapper.insert: insert into goods(gdsName, gdsCat, gdsNewadd, gdsOldadd, gdsTel, gdsNos, gdsNop, gdsCon, gdsSafe, gdsEtc, gdsUtime, gdsPrice, gdsImg, gdsTimg, gdsDate) values(#{gdsName}, #{gdsCat}, #{gdsNewadd},#{gdsOldadd},#{gdsTel},#{gdsNos},#{gdsNop},#{gdsCon},#{gdsSafe},#{gdsEtc},#{gdsUtime},#{gdsPrice},#{gdsImg},#{gdsTimg},NOW())
mapper.select: select * from goods order by gdsNo desc limit #{start},#{cnt}
mapper.update: update goods set gdsName=#{gdsName}, gdsCat=#{gdsCat}, gdsNewadd=#{gdsNewadd}, gdsOldadd=#{gdsOldadd},gdsTel=#{gdsTel},gdsNos=#{gdsNos}, gdsNop=#{gdsNop}, gdsCon==#{gdsCon}, gdsSafe=#{gdsSafe}, gdsEtc=#{gdsEtc}, gdsUtime=#{gdsUtime}, gdsPrice=#{gdsPrice}, gdsImg=#{gdsImg}, gdsTimg=#{gdsTimg} where gdsNo=#{gdsNo}
mapper.select: select * from goods where ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') order by gdsNo desc limit #{start},#{cnt}
select * from goods where gdsCat=#{gdsCat} and ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') order by gdsNo desc limit #{start},#{cnt}
select count(*) from goods where ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
select count(*) from goods where gdsCat=#{gdsCat} and ${searchType} like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
